code: import _toConsumableArray from"/Users/deewilliams/Developer/projects/nodwick-copy/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray.js";import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var initialState={value:[]};var allGameSlice=createSlice({name:'allGames',initialState:initialState,reducers:{addGame:function addGame(state,action){state.value=[].concat(_toConsumableArray(state.value),[action.payload]);},setGames:function setGames(state,action){state.value=action.payload;},removeGame:function removeGame(state,action){state.value=state.value.filter(function(game){return game.gid!==action.payload;});},updateGame:function updateGame(state,action){state.value=state.value.map(function(game){return action.payload.gid===game.gid?action.payload:game;});}}});var _allGameSlice$actions=allGameSlice.actions,addGame=_allGameSlice$actions.addGame,setGames=_allGameSlice$actions.setGames,removeGame=_allGameSlice$actions.removeGame,updateGame=_allGameSlice$actions.updateGame;export{addGame,setGames,removeGame,updateGame};export var selectGames=function selectGames(state){return state.allGames.value;};export default allGameSlice.reducer;
